mapper.select: /* JobMapper.selectJobDetail */ SELECT A.Id , B.Name AS ProcessName , C.Name AS RobotName , C.UserName , D.Name AS MachineName , E.Name AS EnvironmentName , F.CD_NM AS TypeName , G.CD_NM AS StateName , H.CD_NM AS JobPriorityName , CONVERT(CHAR(19), A.StartTime, 20) AS StartTime , CONVERT(CHAR(19), A.EndTime, 20) AS EndTime , I.CD_NM AS SourceName , A.Info FROM SY_JOBS A JOIN SY_RELEASES B ON A.ReleaseId = B.Id JOIN SY_ROBOTS C ON ( A.RobotId = C.Id AND C.IsDeleted = 0 ) JOIN SY_MACHINES D ON ( C.MachineId = D.Id AND D.IsDeleted = 0 ) JOIN SY_ENVIRONMENTS E ON B.EnvironmentId = E.Id JOIN TB_CMMN_CD F ON ( C.Type = F.CD AND F.CLS_CD = '0006' AND F.USE_AT = 'Y' ) JOIN TB_CMMN_CD G ON ( A.State = G.CD AND G.CLS_CD = '0015' AND G.USE_AT = 'Y' ) JOIN TB_CMMN_CD H ON ( A.JobPriority = H.CD AND H.CLS_CD = '0010' AND H.USE_AT = 'Y' ) JOIN TB_CMMN_CD I ON ( A.Source = I.CD AND I.CLS_CD = '0016' AND I.USE_AT = 'Y' ) WHERE A.Id = #{id}
